title: New blood

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- at 2 invites, you gain  a one use basic defense vest!
- At 3 invites, you gain an attack
- At 10 invites, you win!

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: invite 10 people to gim, or live to see the end of the gmae

desc:
Post 5095
Attributes
- Create a discord invite link to this server and invite people
- The more people you invite, The stronger you become!
- Recruits who join only work if the account was made before you rolled this role (so no creating new accounts!)
- Free reroll **only** if this is your first roll.
